job_description: Business Intelligence Senior Advisor Slovakia Dell Technologies is driven by data. Our business is built on the understanding that data creates value and drives progress. Internal clients across Dell rely on us to analyze, test, validate, and maintain the integrity of data. We make use of leading-edge software and tools to collect, mine, and interpret data and produce dashboards to influence performance related decisions with a global impact. Join us as a Business Intelligence Senior Advisor in our Supply Chain Performance Management team in Bratislava, Slovakia to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Business Intelligence Senior Advisor , you will evaluate business data to produce meaningful insights and metrics, identifying trends that improve business performance. You will influence decisions based on analytics insights and engage in performance and program management for projects across all regions. You will encourage best practices and knowledge sharing within the organization and as a trusted partner for customer centric KPIs you will have a profound impact on customer satisfaction. You will: Analyze data, formulate conclusions and provide summary analysis and interpretation to demand planning leadership. Provide analytical and business intelligence support to a business unit with the ability to work on projects and manage stakeholders across business verticals & regions. Visualize the data through PowerBI in order to discover ineffectiveness. A utomate the data flow through SSIS and R. Monitor and maintain automations post-implementation and resolve any potential issues to ensure smooth business operations Define projects, collect requirements, write detailed plans, and coordinate efforts across teams Simplify and standardize reports at regular intervals, define and influence metrics definitions from a global perspective Design, run and implement reporting to support the demand planning teams and collaborate with other groups to provide feedback and help in process improvement Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements 5+ yrs. of relevant experience with a Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Data Management, Statistics, Machine Learning Demonstrable advanced SQL knowledge and ability to create medium to complex queries and procedures in PostgreSQL and Teradata Experience with visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Ability to collaborate in a team environment with proven expertise in reporting. Problem-solving and trouble-shooting skills using operational and diagnostic procedures. Ability to maintain databases, cleanse and validate data as needed, develop database logic to extract required information for reporting. Desirable Requirements Working knowledge in tools such as R-studio & SSIS. Salary staring from: 3 000 EUR gross/monthly Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That is why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you are looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we are looking for you. Application closing date: 15 January 2023 Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play.
